content: The ball will burst through now to cover another portion of the path, so dash forward and head to the left again, where you'll find a Purple Lingzhi to harvest. Ignore the Scorching Flame enemy, as the ball will take care of this.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass III' and the sub-subsection 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai'.
The content is as follows:
The ball will burst through now to cover another portion of the path, so dash forward and head to the left again, where you'll find a Purple Lingzhi to harvest. Ignore the Scorching Flame enemy, as the ball will take care of this.
